tasks.task: Riding a quad bike to check the field
subtasks: Sit on the quad bike
Grip the handlebars tightly
Steer the quad bike to navigate the field
Apply gentle pressure on the accelerator to maintain speed
Look around the field to check for damage or issues
Tilt head to get a better view of the plants
Scan the field for any areas that look different
Note any wilting or discolored plants
Check the rows of plants for any missing or dried-up ones
Move arms for balance while walking
Use legs to power the walking movement
Bend down to check plants close to the ground
Squat down if needed to inspect lower leaves or roots
Walk along rows, stepping carefully to avoid damaging the plants

tasks.task: Checking if the olives are ready to harvest
subtasks: Inspect several olive trees or branches
Feel the olive fruits to determine ripeness
Look for olives that have turned a dark color, indicating readiness
Compare the color and texture of different olives on the same tree
Consider the stage of growth and color change when making a final decision
Walk through the field to assess the terrain
Identify areas that may need special attention, such as humps or depressions
Mark the areas if necessary to avoid confusion during the task
Determine the direction in which to till the soil
Begin tilling, adjusting the equipment as needed

tasks.task: Loading a bale into a trailer
subtasks: Dismount the quad bike
Approach the bale stack
Lift the bale using arms and legs
Place the bale onto the trailer, securing it if necessary
Check that the bale is stable before continuing

tasks.task: Checking the field with a quad bike
Checking the field by quad bike
Checking if the olives are ready to harvest
subtasks: Inspect multiple olive trees or branches
Evaluate individual olives for ripeness
Consider the uniformity across the tree
